attributes.action: Extend the Job Support Scheme and Business Grants to those in Tier 2 locations.
attributes.additional_details: Failure of the government to provide support to the businesses and workers in Tier 2 locations will risk the survival of many businesses and risk thousands of jobs that would be protected if the Job Support Scheme and Business Grants were extended into Tier 2. The government has vowed to protect jobs and businesses during the Covid-19 pandemic however this latest set of restrictions and lack of support is the biggest threat to businesses and jobs since the pandemic started in March.
attributes.background: Extend the JSS and grant schemes to all businesses and workers in Tier 2 locations who at present without government support will find themselves significantly worse off as a result of government restrictions. Than if you were in Tier 3 of which business are forced to close because of restrictions.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new national lockdown, and has stated that the the Coronavirus Job Retention Scheme (CJRS) - also known as the Furlough scheme - will remain open until December, and that business premises forced to close in England are to receive grants worth up to £3,000 per month under the Local Restrictions Support Grant, and £1.1bn is being given to Local Authorities, for one-off payments to enable them to support businesses more broadly: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/furlough-scheme-extended-and-further-economic-support-announced
